story.storykicker: More than half a million Le Superphone users get the much awaited Supertainment membership! The latest OTA update also enhance battery life.
story.storybody:
The much awaited update for eUI 5.5 has finally arrived! The new OTA version of eUI 5.5.014S will now empower users by letting them seamlessly view their favorite channels and movies on the go.

This OTA update tailormade for the Indian market will also enhance the battery life of Superphones and will iron out minor glitches faced by a few users.

Eros Now's Levidi app will allow LeEco members to access over 2000+ movies across different Indian languages. Users will also be able to browse and watch 100+ Live TV channels through the LIVE app on their Superphone that is powered by Yupp TV. Let us also remind you that Superphone users are getting to view their favourite movies and shows without the annoying Ad breaks.

LeEco Drive and LeMusic services will be available in Q3 2016. Watch this space for further OTA updates.


Le Superphones have powerful processors for multi tasking and USB Type C chargers for super fast charging.  While Le 1s Eco is powered by MediaTek Helio X10 processor, Le 1s is powered by Mediatek Helio X10 Processor, and Le Max is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 810 processor. The Superphones also have  the  Le Touch feature that gives  its fingerprint sensor  a precision rate of  99.3 percent.

For those who are not aware, LeEco, formerly known as Letv, is a global pioneering internet and technology company with multiple internet ecosystems across content, devices, applications and platforms. LeEco is the world's first video company to go public with a market capitalization of more than $12 billion USD.
